comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Store some customised created Tiles in SDCard/osmdroid/tile/Mapnik folder 2. Start the the application using mapView.setTileSource(TileSourceFactory.MAPNIK); 3. the tiles stored in SDCard are reloaded/replaced with the default tiles from osm What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Should use the stored files if present. If not present use Internet to download it. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? osmdroid-android-3.0.5.jar Please provide any additional information below. Add some flag system to handle this Raj
Issue 281 has been merged into this issue.
